function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rise of insecure work arrangements including casual, fixed term, and market-mediated arrangements","Impact":"Increased likelihood of contagious diseases spreading in workplaces with high turnover and lack of job security","Mitigation":"Implement regulations and policies to provide job security and benefits for casual and temporary workers","Technologies":"Workforce management and scheduling software for efficient allocation of resources","People":"Casual, fixed term, and temporary workers","Owner":"Government and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"High unemployment rates and long-term unemployment","Impact":"Increased economic stress leading to potential health and social issues, including higher risk of contagious diseases due to socioeconomic factors","Mitigation":"Implement job creation initiatives and support programs for the unemployed, as well as targeted public health interventions","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying employment trends and areas for intervention","People":"Unemployed individuals and communities","Owner":"Government, NGOs, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Hysteresis in the labor market","Impact":"Potential for sustained high unemployment, leading to increased societal vulnerability to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Invest in education and training programs, as well as economic stimulus to promote job growth and reduce long-term unemployment","Technologies":"Online learning platforms and workforce development tools","People":"Unemployed individuals and communities","Owner":"Government, educational institutions, and employers"}]}
